io.netty.channel

Class ChannelHandlerUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerUtil

  • public final class ChannelHandlerUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for use within your ChannelHandler implementation.

      • addToNextOutboundBuffer

        public static boolean addToNextOutboundBuffer(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                              Object msg)
        Add the msg to the next outbound buffer in the ChannelPipeline. This takes special care of msgs that are of type ByteBuf.

      • addToNextInboundBuffer

        public static boolean addToNextInboundBuffer(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                             Object msg)
        Add the msg to the next inbound buffer in the ChannelPipeline. This takes special care of msgs that are of type ByteBuf.
